title: How has food delivery culture grown in Korea?

korean: 한국의 배달 문화는 정말 엄청나게 성장한 것 같아요.
요즘은 정말 안 되는 게 없을 정도예요.
한식, 양식, 일식, 디저트, 심지어 편의점 물건까지 배달되잖아요.
배민, 쿠팡이츠, 요기요 같은 배달 앱들이 정말 잘 발달했어요.
특히 코로나 때 배달 문화가 폭발적으로 성장했죠.
외식을 못 하니까 배달 음식 주문이 엄청 늘었거든요.
그리고 1인 가구가 늘어나면서 배달 수요도 계속 증가하고 있어요.
요즘은 새벽 배달도 가능하고, 배달 시간도 점점 빨라지고 있고요.
배달 로봇이나 드론 배달 같은 것도 시범 운영하고 있더라고요.
근데 배달비나 수수료가 점점 올라서 부담되는 것도 사실이에요.
그래도 편리함 때문에 배달 문화는 계속 성장할 것 같아요.
english: Korea's delivery culture has really grown tremendously.
Even before, there was delivery from Chinese restaurants or chicken places,
but these days, there's really nothing that can't be done.
Korean food, Western food, Japanese food, desserts, even convenience store items are delivered.
Delivery apps like Baemin, Coupang Eats, and Yogiyo have really developed well.
Especially during COVID, delivery culture grew explosively.
Since people couldn't dine out, delivery food orders increased tremendously.
And as single-person households increase, delivery demand continues to increase too.
These days, dawn delivery is also possible, and delivery times are getting faster.
Delivery robots and drone delivery are also being pilot-tested.
But it's true that delivery fees and service charges are gradually rising, which is burdensome.
Still, because of the convenience, I think delivery culture will continue to grow.
